ComicInfo.Title: City Fall Part Six
ComicInfo.Summary:
'City Fall: Part Six'
In this breathtaking penultimate issue to City Fall, Shredder asserts his dominance over the criminal underworld of NYC through a show of force. But what happens when the Turtles crash the party? With allegiances shifting no one is safe from all-out war!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Mateus Santolouco | 1 | B | Cover B | Kevin Eastman (a) & Ronda Pattison (c) | 5 | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover | Kenneth Loh (a) & Ian Herring (c) | 4 | RE | Retailer Exclusive - Jetpack Comics | Kevin Eastman | 2 | RE | Retailer Exclusive - Jetpack Comics | Kevin Eastman | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 00:22:50. [CVDB431466]
ComicInfo.Writer: Kevin Eastman, Bobby Curnow, Tom Waltz
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Ian Herring, Kenneth Loh, Kevin Eastman, Mateus Santolouco, Ronda Pattison
ComicInfo.Characters: Alopex, Angel, Antonio Puzorelli, April O'Neil, Bebop, Donatello, Harold Lillja, Hun, Kitsune, Leonardo, Malo, Master Splinter, Michelangelo, Old Hob, Raphael, Rocksteady, Shredder, Slash, Storm, Tang Shen, Victor, Walter White, Woody Dirkins
ComicInfo.Teams: Foot Clan, Purple Dragons, Savate Ninja, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
ComicInfo.Locations: Church Lair, New York City, New York State
